DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Sponsor Name Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the clinical trial sponsor name.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The words to describe an organization which supports a clinical trial.  [Manually-curated]_A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
